item.title: My First Post
item.description: I guess this is the first Is it not? OH, important! for the headers: Drafts do not get deployed; once you finish a post, update the header of the post to say draft: false Regarding the date: 2019-03-26T08:47:11+01:00 Means: year 2019, month 3, day 26. 8 Hugo has drafts, future and expired content dates! Hugo allows you to set draft, publishdate, and even expirydate in your contentâ€™s front matter.
